questions.question: What is the primary goal of fault finding in a process plant?

answers.a: To identify the root cause of a fault
answers.b: To repair or replace faulty equipment
answers.c: To minimize downtime and reduce maintenance costs
answers.d: To improve plant safety and efficiency

questions.question: Which of the following is a common method used for fault finding in a process plant?
What is the term for the process of identifying and addressing the underlying causes of a fault?
What is the purpose of a maintenance schedule in a process plant?

answers.a: To plan and schedule maintenance activities
answers.b: To track and record maintenance activities
answers.c: To assign maintenance tasks to personnel

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of maintenance that involves performing maintenance tasks based on the condition of equipment?
What is the term for the process of identifying and prioritizing maintenance tasks based on their importance and urgency?
Which of the following is a benefit of implementing a Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) in a process plant?
What is the purpose of a work order in a process plant?

answers.a: To assign maintenance tasks to personnel
answers.b: To track and record maintenance activities
answers.c: To provide a detailed description of maintenance tasks

questions.question: Which of the following is a key aspect of a successful maintenance program in a process plant?

answers.b: Proper training and development of maintenance personnel
